ygData.subject: RE: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! I ve been reading the list for a while and I wanted to introduce myself. My main character is Elahana (Eudrite cleric)on the Bertxo server. I play
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone! I've been reading the list for a while and I wanted to
introduce myself. My main character is Elahana (Eudrite cleric)on the Bertxo
server. I play with my boyfriend and my other roommate. We have a really
great group. My boyfriend plays a human monk and my roommate plays a Edurite
wizard. It seems like we've been all over the world. Most recently we've
been to Unrest and to BlackBurrow. I really enjoy playing Everquest. It's
not at all like the other rpgs I have played. Most of the ones I played were
text based. (gemstone) Anyway, If anyone else is on the Bertox server I
would love to hear from you!

Elahana (Romney)
